isis.stitle: TSI 03-12-03 - High-Pressure Pump Seal Service Kit

geninfo.para: This TSI applies to model years 1999 through 2003 for the T 444E engine.
A condition can occur with oil leaking from the high-pressure pump area. These leaks usually occur when the plug or fittings loosen over time.
A service kit is available to correct leaks at the high-pressure hose fittings or the port plug. If a leak occurs at the check valve or ferry plug, the high-pressure pump must be replaced.

This kit is for the T444E engine and is intended for on-vehicle repair only. The service kit contains three O-rings, a capsule of Loctite® 680 Sealant and an installation instruction sheet describing the procedure to stop the leaks.
The service kit is available by ordering part number 1843716C91 from your International® dealer or Service Parts supplier.
The leak may be coming from the pump fittings where the high-pressure lines are attached and/or the port plug located at the rear of the oil passage (see Figure 1).

caution.para: If oil leaks from the port plug or the high-pressure fittings, order the high-pressure pump service kit.
If oil leaks from the check valve plug or ferry plug, replace the high pressure pump.
